Package org.flag4j.arrays.dense

Class FieldMatrix<T extends Field<T>>

java.lang.Object
org.flag4j.arrays.backend_new.AbstractTensor<FieldMatrix<T>,Field<T>[],T>
org.flag4j.arrays.backend.TensorOverSemiRing<FieldMatrix<T>,FieldMatrix<T>,Field<T>[],T>

org.flag4j.arrays.dense.FieldMatrix<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of the field element for the matrix.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, DenseMatrixMixinOld<FieldMatrix<T>,CooFieldMatrix<T>,FieldVector<T>,Field<T>[],T>, DenseTensorMixin<FieldMatrix<T>,CooFieldMatrix<T>>, MatrixMixinOld<FieldMatrix<T>,FieldMatrix<T>,FieldVector<T>,FieldVector<T>,Field<T>[],T>, MatrixVectorOpsMixin<FieldMatrix<T>,FieldVector<T>,FieldVector<T>>, TensorBinaryOpsMixin<FieldMatrix<T>,FieldMatrix<T>>, TensorMixin<FieldMatrix<T>,Field<T>[],T>
public class FieldMatrix<T extends Field<T>> extends DenseFieldMatrixBase<FieldMatrix<T>,CooFieldMatrix<T>,CsrFieldMatrix<T>,FieldVector<T>,T>

A dense matrix whose entries are Field elements.

Field matrices have mutable entries but fixed shape.

A matrix is essentially equivalent to a rank 2 tensor but has some extended functionality and may have improved performance for some operations.

See Also:

      public static FieldMatrix I(int numRows, int numCols, Field fieldValue)
      Constructs an identity-like matrix of the specified shape. That is, a matrix of zeros with ones along the principle diagonal.

      numCols - Number of columns in the identity-like matrix.

      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the specified number of rows or columns is less than 1.

    • pow

      public FieldMatrix<T> pow(int n)

      Computes the matrix multiplication of this matrix with itself n times. This matrix must be square.

      For large n values, this method may significantly more efficient than calling #mult(Matrix) this.mult(this) n times.

      Parameters:
      n - Number of times to multiply this matrix with itself. Must be non-negative.
      Returns:
      If n=0, then the identity
